name: not wild ball ultra
description:
Another homework which is also a sequel to my previous game.

Controls:

  • wasd to move;
  • space to jump;
  • esc to escape;
  • mouse to all the rest.

Features:

  • added menus;
  • new level, in which you can choose where to go! (i mean "to roll");
  • visual effects;
  • pieces that can be picked up;
  • the game can be completed this time (oh wow);
  • improved light (well, sort of).
